title: How to Make a Bathroom a Steamroom

steps.title: Make sure there's proper ventilation.
steps.content: Make sure there's proper ventilation. This is crucial to preventing mold and mildew growth.

steps.title: Turn the shower on as hot as possible.
steps.content: Turn the shower on as hot as possible.

steps.title: Bring in a chair with arms for safety and relaxation.
steps.content: Bring in a chair with arms for safety and relaxation. Don't sit on a toilet, as it could be slippery.

steps.title: Do not enter the scalding hot water.
steps.content: Do not enter the scalding hot water. Sit away from the sources.
